p: Histopathological analysis of liver sections revealed hydropic degeneration and periportal lymphocytic infiltration in some individuals in the HEV group at 7 dpi (Fig.Â 2A). At 21 dpi, mild multifocal lymphocytic infiltration was observed. At 28 dpi, microvascular steatosis and glycogenated nuclei were present, but lymphocytic infiltration was no longer observed.
